attributes.action: Prevent a minister without a general election mandate invoking Article 50
attributes.additional_details: Pursuant to the notification of the democratically elected leader of the UK to step down following the EU referendum prior to invoking article 50 and thus having no publicly elected leader in place throughout the withdrawal negotiations, prevent any UK prime-minister or government without a public mandate secured by way of democratic election through a general election commencing the  UK’s irreversible withdrawal from the EU by invocation of Article 50 of the treaty on European Union
attributes.background: Pursuant to the notification of the democratically elected leader of the UK to step down following the EU referendum prior to invoking article 50 we have no publicly elected leader in place throughout the withdrawal negotiations.
